name: It's A Flop!
description:
In the summer of 2020, I was a newly-graduated, indie film producer looking for my big break into showbiz. I had all sorts of ideas, but… well. Let’s just say the film industry is not the most welcoming.

It was one night that I happened upon an idea while chatting with a business-major friend of mine. I could make more money with a flop than a hit!

It was simple. Raise more money than I need for the production, set it up to fail, and boom! Pack up and buy a one-way ticket out of the states and start a comfortable life elsewhere.

All I needed was the perfect combination to create the perfect flop…

Controls : Left Mouse Click to Selectable Object to choose your option.

Credits :

Programmer - Chaki Behappy

Game Design and Creative Writings - Chloe Monet

Game Design & Audio Designer - Matthias Fluor
